income_messages:
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-21 20:01:29
SUBJECT:   Hello
  Hello
, i have made arrangement with a delivery agent who is ready to move the fund to your country, please are you ready to receive him? if yes kindly furnish me with your address and telephone number for easy communication with you and the agent on his arrival, the fund needs to be out now as the country is getting more unsafe.
I am anxiously waiting to hear from you.
Thanks
David
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-31 02:39:05
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Dear Helen,
Thanks for your response towards my proposal; I hope you are fine when my
mail meets you? sorry for my late response, it is because of the nature of
my work,we have been busy here in the camp.
This is just to inform you that the deal I want to do with you is100% risk
free provided that we can trust each other, be sincere with each other and
keep it confidential. Moreover it is important for me to give you the full
details and procedures of this deal, so that you will see how it will work
and get concluded.
Listen very carefully, the only way that we can make this deal and get the
fund/box delivered to you is If only  you can adhere to my instruction to
avoid mistakes, I promise to give you the best  co-operation as soon as the
fund/box departs from Ukraine.
However, we are going to proceed, and you have to promise that you will
never sit on the fund when it finally gets to your disposal, I have made
all the arrangements with a delivery company that normally delivers things
for us the US Army here and one of the agents accepts to deliver the box
for us.
The fund/box has been deposited with a security company since all this
while and now i have also notified them that we will be coming for the
claim and, as soon as you are ready the Delivery agent will go and pick it
from the security company and deliver it to you because we are not allow to
go out of the camp any time we want, for that reason i don't want you to
delay, as we have made all the arrangement for the departure of the
fund/box.
Once again I want you to promise me  that if you  receive the USD $12.m
(Twelve Million  US Dollars) that you will take 10% of the total fund and
keep our 90% for us until when we will finish here which i know will be
soon, or alternatively, You can go into partnership with us in any business
we shall decide to invest in your country or elsewhere. Please let me know
the one you prefer.
The importance of this is for my own security so that you cannot betray me
when the funds are being delivered to you, I have all my hopes in this
transaction because I will soon go on retirement. We must hurry up with
this transaction because it has stayed here in this country for a long time
and since the country is getting worse, we don't need to delay because this
is all my achievement here.
Please, kindly let me know your assurance and your capacity to accommodate
the huge amount when it finally gets to your disposal?
 If you can assure me your capability of assisting me then, note that the
box can depart from here latest in the next 2 to 4 days to your country, i
need your urgent answer on this.
N/B :here in the camp we are not allowed to make calls or use phone for
security purpose, therefore all our communication will always be via email
unless, i get time to enter the city to call you, note we did not informed
the security company nor the agent who will be delivering the box that the
content is money, I told them that it's my family valuable Item, so have
that in mind to avoid any mistake that will make us losing the fund.
I will be waiting to hear from you urgently, then I will inform the
Delivery company and know the day the consignment will depart .
while replying don't forget to include all your details and ID.
Thanks
*David Johnson*
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-31 19:55:54
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello Helen,
I think my email explain everything, however if you have any question to
ask you are free to ask.
All i am waiting for is your acceptance by sending your details to me, then
i will inform the agent who will deliver the box, the deal is risk free,
nothing to fear about.
i am waiting to hear from you.
Thanks
David
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-03 11:45:28
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello Helen,
No one has every follow up on this for i never involved anyone previously,
as i stated earlier, this deal is risk free because no one has knowledge of
this said fund and the diplomatic agent who will be delivering it to you
have immunity which allow him to move any item to any part of the world,
all you will do is to receive the box from him and as soon as you received
it, i will resign from work and come over for sharing and investment, it is
a right choice to work with me because this fund will change our life and
is risk free.
kindly make up your mind to enable this consignment to depart here this
week, you are the one delaying it departure.
If you are willing to work with me, kindly send me your details and id.
Thanks
I am anxiously waiting to hear from you.
David
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-04 14:48:19
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
The next step is you sending your details and i will go and pay off the
security company and hand over the consignment to the agent who will be
delivering it to you, i need your address, mobile line and Id, because that
is what the delivery agent will us to reach you and that is also which i
will use to meet you while i coming to to after you might have received the
fund.
Thanks
David
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-04 15:44:33
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
I am on duty and you can't expect me to write emails all this time, and you
can't expect a delivery agent to be writing you an email and be waiting for
your responses when he arrives for delivery to your country.
If you are not comfortable then let me look for another partner.
From: d*****************0@gmail.com
To: bp71750@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-05 18:57:42
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Hello Helen.
What timeline are you talking about? I think I have given you all the
explanation you need to know about this deal, and you are not making any
point based on that as one who read the previous mail.
What you talkin about is the time line I don't understand in which area of
time you are talking about.
you are the one delaying the movement of the fund and you are talking about
time.
Thanks
David
